about_the_game:
The Cultists have harvested the power of the sun,

plunging the realm into a perpetual night where shadow demons, known as Wraiths, lurk in every corner, feeding on any trace of light they find.

Gameplay Features

Each level in Eclipsed the Light Divided presents a new challenge, with the goal of restoring light by activating lanterns, eliminating cultists, and Hunting shadow demons. The further you progress, the harder the enemies become, and the more powerful your abilities will need to be Explore Find Items That will Help you with Your Journey 

• Restore the Light:

To complete each level, Luna must locate and activate lanterns scattered throughout the darkness. As each lantern is lit, hope is restored, and the oppressive darkness is weakened.

• Fast-Paced Combat:

Like modern FPS games, it emphasizes dynamic, adrenaline-pumping gameplay where players rapidly face cultists, shadow demons, and powerful bosses.

• RPG Progression:

Players unlock abilities through a Light and Shadow perk tree, making impactful choices that define their playstyle and have long-term effects. Unlocking tarot card power-ups adds depth to gameplay, allowing varied builds and strategies.

• Horror Atmosphere:

The game immerses players in a terrifying, shadowy world with gothic visuals and eerie enemies, creating a constant sense of dread. The stakes are heightened by the need to relight lanterns and fend off an oppressive darkness.

Key Features

• Fast-Paced Gothic Horror FPS:

A blend of fast-paced shooter mechanics and atmospheric horror.

• Optional Grayscale Filter

Choose to experience a haunting, gothic atmosphere with an optional grayscale visual mode, intensifying the horror elements of the game.

• Boss Encounters:

Take on powerful foes, including the stealthy Wraith and the ultimate cult leader.

• Tarot-Based Power-Ups:

Discover tarot cards for unique powers each level, adding a layer of strategy.

• Skill Tree:

Choose and upgrade abilities in a Light and Shadow skill tree, creating lasting effects as you progress.

• Dynamic Combat:

Restore light by battling a variety of enemies with different abilities and attack styles.

. Replayability

High replayability with dynamic Light vs. Shadow skill paths, varied Tarot power-ups, unlockable secrets, and evolving enemy encounters. Each run presents new challenges and strategies for a fresh experience every time.

Grayscale Filter

“Eclipsed: The Light Divided” offers an optional grayscale filter, adding a darker, more foreboding tone to the gameplay experience. This feature lets players immerse themselves in a stark, desaturated world that complements the game’s gothic horror elements. Switch between grayscale and color to tailor the visual atmosphere to your preference.

Full GamePlay Trailer Coming Soon
